CustomField.formula:
IF( OR(ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "Requested by Insured" ), ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "Submitted to Carrier" ), ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "Endorsement Quote Presented" )), IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01537000000JDqt',""),
IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "Bind Order Sent" ), ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "Cancellation Notice Sent" )), IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01537000000JDqy',""),
IF( OR( ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "Delivered to Insured" ), ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "Cancelled" ), ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "Rescinded" )), IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01537000000JDJB',""),
IF( ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "Closed Lost" ), IMAGE('/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=01537000000JDqo',""),
"" ))))
CustomField.label: Endorsement CC
